disease: Malignant neoplasm of short bones of right upper limb

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Bone fracture
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to weakened bone structure

symptoms.name: General malaise
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild weakness to severe illness, depending on cancer progression

physical_findings: Palpable mass or swelling in the affected bone

imaging_findings.X-ray: May show lytic lesions, bone destruction, or periosteal reaction

required: Imaging findings consistent with malignant neoplasm of bone
supportive: Symptoms such as pain and bone fracture
Physical examination findings such as palpable mass or tenderness
